definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
to look after/to take into consideration/to attend to

sentences.english: The clinical data of 36 cases of severe pulmonary contusion was reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 对36例严重肺挫伤患者的临床资料进行回顾性分析。

sentences.english: Methods To review the operative treatment of various kinds of fracture and luxation of anklebone in 60 cases.
sentences.chinese: 方法回顾60例各种踝关节骨折及脱位的手术治疗。

sentences.english: Methods X-Ray films of 76 cases of ileocecal lesions were reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 方法回顾分析76例回盲部病变X线表现。

sentences.english: The end of the year is the best time to review and look ahead.
sentences.chinese: 年关是一个回顾和展望的好时机。

sentences.english: The second part recalled the Linxia's economic development model.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分是临夏州经济发展模式回顾。

sentences.english: In Chapter Two, theories on compensation are reviewed to form the theoretical foundation of translation of English alliteration into Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 第二章回顾了作为头韵汉译理论基础的翻译补偿理论。

sentences.english: Reviews of experience point to potential benefits and practical difficulties of such systems.
sentences.chinese: 回顾指向潜在利益与在这样的系统中实际困难的经验。

sentences.english: We will re-visit these a little later in the article.
sentences.chinese: 我们将在文章的后面部分再次回顾这些内容。

sentences.english: Methods The clinical data of 18 patients with SRMs were analyzed and summarized retrospectively.
sentences.chinese: 方法回顾性总结分析18例蝶骨嵴脑膜瘤的临床资料。

sentences.english: What does this sketchy historical record suggest for today's number one power?
sentences.chinese: 上述粗略的历史回顾，对今天的头号强国有何启示呢？

sentences.english: Methods The clinical data of 33 cases of MPCDT were analysed retrospectively.
sentences.chinese: 方法回顾性分析33例消化道多原发癌的临床资料。

sentences.english: This paper revisits the issue of the relative advantages of improved search and knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 本论文重新回顾了高级搜索与知识相对优势的问题。

sentences.english: Methods To analysis 46 cases with IPPV resisted to mechanical ventilation.
sentences.chinese: 方法对46例人机对抗患者进行回顾性分析。

sentences.english: Take advantage of a digital SLR's screen to review images.
sentences.chinese: 利用好单反相机屏幕来回顾拍过的照片。

sentences.english: Methods Retrospective study was made on 65 cases of acetabular fractures.
sentences.chinese: 方法对65例髋臼骨折进行回顾性研究。

sentences.english: Methods The imaging findings and pathologic characteristics of 31 patients with EGB were analyzed retrospectively.
sentences.chinese: 方法回顾分析31例EGB的影像表现及病理特征。

definition: to make an inventory/to take stock
to learn sth over again/to review/to brush up/to revive (memories, friendship etc)
(after completing a game of chess) to replay the game, analyzing the players' moves/(stock market) to resume trading
to take a look at/to examine/to survey/(coll.) pretty soon
outlook/prospect/to look ahead/to look forward to
(used after a verb) give it a go/to do (sth for a bit to give it a try)/one time/once/in a while/all of a sudden/all at once
summary/to summarize/to collect (data, receipts etc)/to gather and report/also written 匯總|汇总
summary/to summarize/to collect (data, receipts etc)/to gather and report
